mandatoryFields.project.name: HeartBeat — Transparency OS
mandatoryFields.brandFoundations.brandDescription: HeartBeat is a Transparency Operating System for hybrid and distributed companies. It provides real-time visibility into people, work, and delivery powered by a multi-agent AI system.
mandatoryFields.brandFoundations.mission: To transform scattered signals into clear insights, actionable workflows, and proactive alerts that keep teams aligned and healthy.
mandatoryFields.brandFoundations.vision: Make hybrid collaboration more visible, predictable, and healthy.
mandatoryFields.problemDefinition.primaryProblem: Modern hybrid teams struggle with no clear & one-place visibility into presence, availability, or engagement, leading to scattered signals and manual reporting cycles.
mandatoryFields.solutionOverview.valueProposition: HeartBeat solves this through real-time transparency and agentic intelligence, integrating with core workplace tools to create a pulse dashboard for HR, Delivery, and Ops.
mandatoryFields.targetAudience[0].name: Managers of Hybrid Teams (Delivery/Project/Product Owners/Tech Leads)
targetAudience[0].painPoints: No clear & one-place visibility into presence, availability, or engagement
Scattered delivery signals across Slack, Jira, GitHub, Docs
No single source of truth for team alignment, progress, or blockers

project.name: HeartBeat — Transparency OS
project.description: HeartBeat is a Transparency Operating System for hybrid and distributed companies. It provides real-time visibility into people, work, and delivery powered by a multi-agent AI system.

brandFoundations.brandDescription: HeartBeat is a Transparency Operating System for hybrid and distributed companies. It provides real-time visibility into people, work, and delivery powered by a multi-agent AI system.
brandFoundations.mission: To transform scattered signals into clear insights, actionable workflows, and proactive alerts that keep teams aligned and healthy.
brandFoundations.vision: Make hybrid collaboration more visible, predictable, and healthy.
brandFoundations.problemStatement: Modern hybrid teams struggle with: No clear & one-place visibility into presence, availability, or engagement; Scattered delivery signals across Slack, Jira, GitHub, Docs; No single source of truth for team alignment, progress, or blockers.
brandFoundations.solutionStatement: HeartBeat solves this through real-time transparency and agentic intelligence. The platform integrates with core workplace tools to create a pulse dashboard for HR, Delivery, and Ops.
brandFoundations.brandPromise: Real-time visibility into people, work, and delivery.

targetAudience.name: Managers of Hybrid Teams
targetAudience.psychographics: Struggles with manual reporting, relies on gut feel instead of data, wants objective overview.
goals: Identify blockers, risks, and next deliverables
painPoints: Relying on gut feel instead of data
Manual reporting cycles that waste hours
behaviours: Switches between agents to see full context
Uses tools like Slack, Jira, GitHub, CI/CD

targetAudience.name: HR Leaders
targetAudience.psychographics: Concerned with burnout, disengagement, and wellbeing.
painPoints: Unable to detect early signals of burnout or disengagement
Lack of single source of truth for people pulse
behaviours: Uses HeartBeat to see company people pulse

targetAudience.name: Operations Leaders
targetAudience.psychographics: Focused on efficiency, allocations, and reporting flow.
behaviours: Uses HeartBeat to see operational flow

targetAudience.name: Executives
targetAudience.psychographics: Needs high-level objective overview of company health.
painPoints: Lacking an objective overview of company health
jobsToBeDone: Strategic decision making based on org-wide data

positioningAndMessaging.positioningStatement: A Transparency Operating System for hybrid and distributed companies powered by a multi-agent AI system.
positioningAndMessaging.elevatorPitch: HeartBeat transforms scattered signals into clear insights, actionable workflows, and proactive alerts that keep teams aligned and healthy.
messagingPillars: Unified dashboard for HR, Delivery, and Ops
coreHooks: Make agents feel like real colleagues
narrativeFragments: Agents as specialized virtual teammates with human names (Lena, Mira, Dante)
From scattered signals to clear insights

imageryGuidelines: No branding, color accents, or gradients

competitiveAnalysis.marketCategory: Transparency Operating System / Workplace Intelligence / Project Management
competitiveAnalysis.positioningSummary: HeartBeat differentiates via its multi-agent architecture and focus on transparency/visibility across HR, Delivery, and Ops, rather than just deep metric analytics.

uniqueSellingPoints: Transparency OS (Focus on visibility, not just metrics)
differentiationStrategy.whiteSpaceInsights: Need to prove proactive intelligence, not just reactive reporting.
blueOceanIndicators: Agent-to-agent collaboration (e.g. Delivery Agent asking HR Agent data)

websiteGoals: Provide a real-time pulse of teams
Enable monitoring from a unified dashboard
webAndContentNotes.contentStrategyNotes: Agents should have human names (Lena, Mira, Dante) and distinct personalities/roles.

problemDefinition.primaryProblem: No clear & one-place visibility into presence, availability, or engagement.
problemDefinition.businessImpact: Inconsistent insights, wasted hours on reporting, potential burnout or disengagement going undetected.
hypotheses: Real-time transparency and agentic intelligence can solve these struggles.

solutionOverview.valueProposition: HeartBeat is a Transparency Operating System that uses a multi-agent AI system to transform scattered signals into clear insights, actionable workflows, and proactive alerts.
differentiators: Focus on transparency over deep analytics

earlyAdopterProfile.description: Managers of Hybrid Teams (Delivery/Project/Product Owners) who struggle with visibility.
triggerEvents: Loss of visibility in hybrid setup

idealCustomerProfile.description: Hybrid and distributed companies needing an org-wide health overview.

leanCanvas.uniqueValueProposition: Transparency Operating System powered by Multi-Agent AI.
leanCanvas.unfairAdvantage: Agent-to-agent communication and specialized agent domains (Delivery, HR, Ops) in one lobby.
leanCanvas.highLevelConcept: A team of AI agents (Lena, Mira, Dante) that work as colleagues to provide visibility into company health.

screens.name: HeartBeat Home (Agent Lobby)
screens.purpose: Neutral starting screen to introduce Assistants and choose a dashboard.

screens.name: Delivery Pulse Dashboard
screens.purpose: Monitor delivery flow, tasks, PRs, and team pulse.

screens.name: People Pulse Dashboard
screens.purpose: Monitor sentiment, engagement, availability, and onboarding.

screens.name: Operations Pulse Dashboard
screens.purpose: Monitor reporting status, allocations, and efficiency.

props.key: avatar, name, description, tags, lastInsight, primaryCta, secondaryCta

phases.name: Login & Selection
phases.description: User logs in and selects the Delivery Agent.

phases.name: Dashboard Review
activities: Clicking on panels to focus AI

events.trigger: User clicks on a dashboard panel (e.g., Workload Board)

aiMetadata.creationPrompt: Extract PRD and project details from HeartBeat Prototype repository files.
aiMetadata.extractionSummary: Successfully extracted project vision, goals, personas, and dashboard structure from the PRD and Product Analysis documents.

missingInformation.recommendation: Consult with design team for visual assets and backend team for real API contracts once implementation starts.

assumptions: The repository owner 'Ministry of Programming' is the Client/Organization.
The 'Product' author in PRD refers to the internal product team.
Slate-900 is the primary brand color based on the monochrome UI description.
aiMetadata.extractionNotes: The project is a frontend-only prototype using mocked data, so deep technical specifications for backend/API are not available.
